item.title: üåµ Headed to Tucson for WACV 2025!
item.description: I’am happy to share that i am starting my PhD visiting period of 6 months in Montreal, Canda, at the LIVIA Lab, under the supervision of professor Christian Desrosiers and Jose Dolz, working on anomaly detection and domain-adaptation.
